name: Mystic Mage
description:
Game description:

A mystical magician who owns four elements is preparing for a battle in the arena. His unique abilities allow him to manipulate fire, water, air, and earth, creating powerful storms and firestorms capable of destroying any enemy. But this time, his opponents are hostile mutants who have grown up in a laboratory and become ideal soldiers. The mage makes graceful movements as he runs around the arena and fires magical attacks.

Data security:

The developer said that the application does not collect or transmit user data.
